name: Coloring Game - The Family
detailed_description:
This is the first theme-based DLC for the Coloring Game which is fully dedicated to a single family.
The package contains 30 new images.
The completion of all the levels takes approximately 50 hours.

  • > 1,700,000px
  • New animations
  • New challenges
about_the_game:

short_description: This is the first theme-based DLC for the Coloring Game which is fully dedicated to a single family. The package contains 30 new images.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware support WebGL - OpenGL 2.1 (GPU Memory - 256MB)
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
